This is Mingo's seventh loan with MFP (Microfinanzas Prisma) and he has not had any payment problems to this date. This demonstrates his responsibility to the institution and his group. He will use what he has requested to purchase fertilizer, which is very expensive but necessary for all of his crops.

Translated from Spanish by Susan Haynes, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase fertilizer  for his crops

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.en:
Ana Maria is a member of the Las Golondrinas (“The Swallows”) Village Bank. She is 25 years old and lives with her common-law husband and their two children. Ana Maria and her husband have a motorcycle taxi, which they use to transport passengers around the city of Ayacucho. Her husband also has a mechanic’s shop, where he fixes motorcycle taxis.  Ana Maria needs a loan of 1050 soles, which will be added to some money she has saved up to buy another motorcycle taxi.  Ana Maria dreams of having her own replacement parts store, of selling wholesale, and that her children will grow up to be working professionals. 

Translated from Spanish by Cynthia McMurry, Kiva Fellow

Ana Maria es socia del Banco Comunal Las Golondrinas. 
Ana Maria es conviviente, tiene 25 años y 2 hijos, Ana Maria junto a su esposo tienen un mototaxi con el cual realiza transporte en la ciudad de Ayacucho, Además el esposo de Ana Maria tiene un taller mecánico en el cual arregla mototaxi. 
Ana Maria necesita un préstamo de 1050 soles dinero que será invertido como parte de pago para adquirir otra mototaxi. 
Ana Maria sueña con tener una tienda de repuestos, ser mayorista y que sus hijos sean profesionales.

loans.use: Buy another motorcycle taxi  (partial payment)

loans.name: Miriam

texts.es: Miriam tiene 24 años, es casada, vive con su esposo y su hija en la casa de sus suegros. Siempre le ha gustado la preparación de dulces y pasteles, pero nunca pudo abrir un local para este negocio, pero eso no le impidió a que se dedique a lo que le agrada, desde hace 2 años prepara diversos bocaditos, los cuales los hace en casa de su suegra, quien también le ayuda a prepararlos, por lo general prepara solo para pedidos de las diferentes tiendas de los alrededores, las cuales piden cada quincena, y Miriam trata de atender a varias personas para que las ganancias le permitan cooperar con los gastos de la familia. Con su trabajo garantiza pagar sus cuotas de devolución del préstamo y seguirá trabajando con este grupo de su banco comunal. Miriam invertirá en la compra de moldes de torta y otros implementos para atender compromisos como matrimonios y fiestas infantiles, donde son muy solicitadas las tortas decoradas.
texts.en:
Miriam is 24-years old and lives with her husband and daughter in her in-laws’ house. She has always loved preparing sweets and cakes, and although she could never afford to open a store she has been making and selling baked goods from home for the last 2 years. Her mother-in-law helps, but Miriam usually fulfills the requests from different stores in the area by herself. The orders come in every 2 weeks and she works hard to meet demand so that her earnings can go towards the family’s expenses. Her business ensures she will be able to make her loan payments and continue working with her community bank group. Miriam plans to buy baking pans and other kitchen tools for special orders such as decorated cakes for weddings and children’s parties.

Translated from Spanish by Vivian Lu, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase baking utensils for making cakes

loans.name: Rusmeri

texts.es:
Rusmeri es socia del Banco Comunal Desarrollo.
Rusmeri es conviviente, tiene 24 años y 2 hijos, Rusmeri se dedica a la agricultura de verduras en sus tierras de la comunidad de Compañía, que se ubica a 45 minutos de la ciudad de Ayacucho, sus productos los comercializa en el mercado Nery García Zarate. Además Rusmeri tiene 4 carros que realizan transporte a diferentes distrito para lo cual tiene chóferes.
Rusmeri necesita un préstamo de 600 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de semilla y abono.
Rusmeri sueña con comprar un carro grande para transportar sus productos y mejorar sus negocios.
texts.en:
Rusmeri is a member of Banco Comunal Desarrollo (‘Development Community Bank’). She is 24-years old, lives with her partner and has 2 children. Rusmeri grows vegetables on her land in the town of Compañía, 45 minutes from Ayacucho city. She sells her produce in the Nery García market. She also has 4 cars with hired drivers to take the vegetables to different districts. Rusmeri needs a loan of 600 PEN to purchase seeds and fertilizer. She dreams of buying a larger car to transport her products and improve her business.

Translated from Spanish by Vivian Lu, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of seeds and fertilizer

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is a member of the Las Golondrinas (“The Swallows”) Village Bank. She is 24 years old, single, and lives with her parents. She and her parents run a pharmacy from their house on Callao St., and she and her sister work at the store seven days a week. Maria also sells cell phones, calling cards and cell phone credit.  Maria needs a loan of 1800 soles to buy calling cards and pills.  Maria dreams of expanding her business and of opening new branches. 

Translated from Spanish by Cynthia McMurry, Kiva Fellow

Maria es socia del Banco Comunal Las Golondrinas. 
Maria es soltera y tiene 24 años Maria vive con sus padres y junto a ellos tienen una botica en su casa ubicada en el Jr. Callao, Maria y su hermana se encargan de la atención, actividad que realizan todos los días. Además Maria vende celulares, tarjetas telefónicas y recargas virtuales. 
Maria necesita un préstamo de 1800 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de tarjetas y pastillas. 
Maria sueña con incrementar su negocio, tener otras sucursales.

loans.use: Buy calling cards and pills

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es: Nancy tiene 40 años, es madre soltera y vive con sus dos hijos. Para mantener su hogar tuvo que dedicarse a múltiples actividades, entre todas ellas, encontró en la venta de ropa la oportunidad de suplir las necesidades en su hogar, ya hace10 años que este negocio le es muy rentable ya que compra gran cantidad de mercadería en la ciudad capital y las lleva a su propia ciudad, donde puede duplicar el precio de cada prenda, pero para obtener mayores ganancias  tienes que invertir para grandes cantidades de prendas y trasportarlas hasta su localidad, siendo un costo adicional en su presupuesto. Nancy está en su tercer préstamo con MFP, y siempre ha sido una de las más cumplidas dentro de su grupo de clientas. Con el dinero que solicita aprovechará la gran demanda que hay por fiestas y viajará a la capital para comprar mayores cantidades de prendas para venderlas en las ferias de su ciudad.
texts.en:
Nancy is 40 years old, and a single mother living with her two children. To support her household, she had to dedicate herself to multiple activities. Among these, she found in clothing sales the chance to provide for the family’s needs. She has been in this business for 10 years now, which is very profitable given that she buys a great deal of her merchandise in the capital city to take to her own town where she can double the price of each item. However, to improve her earnings, she has to invest in a large amount of each clothing item and transport them to her area, which is an additional cost. Nancy is in her third loan with MFP, and she has always been one of the most responsible people in her group. With the funds she is requesting, she will take advantage of the great demand over the holiday season due to all the festivities. She will also travel to the capital to purchase a greater quantity of clothes to sell in the markets of her city.

Translated from Spanish by Mary Lynn Malaby, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase the quantity of clothing that she sells.

loans.name: Octavio

texts.es: Octavio tiene 35 años, es casado, vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos. Hace más de 15 años que se dedica a la reparación y venta de carrocería en un local alquilado, pero para Octavio, vale pagar el alquiler, ya que su negocio es muy visitado por diversos taxistas y carroceros, además, también repara autos cuando sufren algunos choques, los plancha y los pinta para cubrir y restaurar los daños. Nos menciona que para realizar esta actividad  hay que ser rápidos y hábiles, ya que la competencia es muy dura de sobrellevar, pero no difícil de superar, todo está en las ganas que Octavio le pone día a día a su trabajo. Este es su tercer préstamo con MFP, y es una persona muy cumplida en sus cargos y responsabilidades, además de ser un hombre muy participativo dentro de su banco comunal. Para poder incrementar sus servicios, Octavio tendrá que adquirir algunas maquinarias que faciliten su trabajo y algunos repuestos que mejoren sus ventas.
texts.en:
Octavio is 35 years old and lives with his wife and their two children. For more than 15 years, Octavio has been doing bodywork and selling cars in a space that he rents. For Octavio, paying the rent is worth it, since many taxi drivers and car owners frequent his business. He also repairs cars after crashes. He flattens out dents and paints them to cover up and restore the damaged areas. Octavio tells us that in order to to well in this business, you have to be quick and competent. The competition is hard to bear but not difficult to overcome, because of the effort Octavio puts into his work day after day. This is his third loan from Microfinanzas PRISMA. He has been very responsible in fulfilling his previous obligations, and is very involved in participating within his village bank. In order to offer a wider range of services and improve his sales, Octavio needs to acquire new machinery and buy some replacement parts.

Translated from Spanish by Cynthia McMurry, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy tools and machinery for bodywork shop

loans.name: Olga

texts.es: Olga tiene 41 años, es casada, vive con su esposo y sus cinco hijos. Se dedica a la venta de ropa desde hace 3 años, tiempo en que esta actividad le ayudó no solo a crecer en su negocio, sino también que ahora ella misma  confecciona diversos modelos de prendas, las cuales tiene como pedidos, estas confecciones las realiza en el pequeño taller que tiene en su hogar, donde le resulta  más fácil trabajar y no descuidar a sus menores hijos. Gracias a que su esposo  coopera en las confecciones, ambos tratan de atender todos los pedidos,  encargándose él de la distribución, pero cuando resultan escasos los pedidos, salen a las ferias a vender algunas prendas confeccionadas que tienen de reserva en casa, para no tener que pasar necesidad y apaciguar el mal momento que hay en algunos meses. Olga  esta en su segundo crédito con MFP, y siempre  mostró puntualidad en sus pagos y en todas las actividades que realiza su banco comunal. El dinero solicitado será invertido en la compra de las telas que requiere para confeccionar unos chalecos que tiene como pedido.
texts.en:
Olga is 41 years old and married with five chidren. She has been selling clothing for the past three years. In this time, not only has her business grown, she has also started sewing a variety of items herself according to orders placed by her customers. She sews the clothing in a small workshop in her home, which allows her to work with ease while still caring for her young children. Her husband helps her with the sewing, so the couple tries to fill all of the orders together. He is in charge of distribution. When there are few orders, they both go to local markets to sell their stock of already made clothing, which they keep in their home, so that they can overcome the difficult moments that arise during some months. This is Olga's second loan from Microfinanzas PRISMA, and she has always been very punctual with all of her payments as well as with activities within her village bank. She plans to use this loan to buy fabric to use for an order of sweaters she is working on.

Translated from Spanish by Cynthia McMurry, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy fabric to sew clothing

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.es:
Lourdes es socia del Banco Comunal Inti que quiere decir Sol en quechua.
Lourdes es casada, tiene 27 años y 1 hijos, Lourdes es enfermera de profesión, Lourdes tiene una farmacia en un local alquilado ubicado en una calle céntrica de la ciudad de Ayacucho, esta cerca de un consultorio obstétrico, actividad que realiza todos los días.
Lourdes necesita un préstamo de 1000 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de jeringas, jarabes, vitaminas.
Lourdes sueña con tener una farmacia grande y salir adelante.
texts.en:
Lourdes is a member of the Inti Communal Bank. Inti means 'sun' in Quechua. Lourdes is 27 years old, married, and has a son. She is a nurse by trade. Lourdes has a little pharmacy she runs out of a rented shop on one of the central streets of Ayacucho city, near an obstetrician's office where she also helps out. Lourdes needs a loan of 1000 soles so that she can purchase syringes, cough medicines and vitamins. Lourdes dreams of owning a large pharmacy and succeeding in life

Translated from Spanish by Sara Sultan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to buy syringes, vitamins and medicine

loans.name: Ronald

texts.es: Ronald tiene 30 años, es soltero, vive con sus padres y hermanos. Es ingeniero civil, pero a la par de ejercer su carrera tiene un negocio asociado con su hermana, con la quien desde muy pequeños estuvieron juntos en todo y ahora también en los negocios, que es uno de los aspectos que más le agrada de  su actividad. Para Ronald tiene una bodega, la cual es muy rentable, ya que cuenta con los productos básicos y a muy buenos precios, que son iguales a los de los mercados, y lo dificultoso es justamente eso, conseguir productos de buena calidad, pero que puedan estar al alcance de sus clientes. Ronald está en su 7mo crédito con MFP, y hasta la fecha no tuvo problemas de pago, es un cliente muy comprometido con los socios de su banco comunal y con la institución. Invertirá la cantidad solicitada en la compra de mercaderías y productos para ampliar su tienda.
texts.en:
Ronald is 30 years old; he is single and lives with his parents and siblings. He is a civil engineer but he also owns a business in partnership with his sister; the two of them have always been very close and their joint venture is a source of great satisfaction for him.

They have a grocery store which is a very profitable; it stocks staple items at very good prices, in line with market prices (it is difficult to find good quality products at affordable prices). Ronald is on his seventh loan from MFP; to date, he has not had any problems with repayment and he is strongly committed to the other members of the community bank and to the institution itself.

He will use the loan to buy merchandise and products to expand the store.

Translated from Spanish by John Rynne, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase stocks in his store

loans.name: Juana Dolores

texts.en:
Juana is a member of the Desarrollo (“Development”) Village Bank.  Juana is 38 years old and lives with her partner and their two children. Juana lives in the Huayllapampa community, located about 30 minutes outside of the city of Ayacucho. Juana has a small store in her house, where she sells dry goods and vegetables. In prickly pear season, Juana also buys prickly pears to send to Lima to sell.  Juana needs a loan of 2000 soles, which she will use to buy rice, sugar, pills and dried beans.  Juana dreams of selling wholesale and of providing her children with a good education. 

Translated from Spanish by Cynthia McMurry, Kiva Fellow

Juana es socia del Banco Comunal Desarrollo. 
Juana es conviviente, tiene 38 años y 2 hijos, Juana vive en la comunidad de Huayllapampa que se ubica a 30 minutos de la ciudad de Ayacucho, Juana tiene una bodega en su casa en donde vende abarrotes, verduras, actividad que realiza todos los días. Además Juana en época de producción de tuna compra y lo envía a la ciudad de Lima. 
Juana necesita un préstamo de 2000 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de arroz, azúcar, pastillas, menestras. 
Juana sueña con tener una tienda mayorista, brindar una buena educación a sus hijos.

loans.use: Buy rice, sugar, pills and dried beans

loans.name: Luz Marcela

texts.en:
Luz is a member of the Desarrollo (“Development”) Village Bank.  Luz is 39 years old and married with three children; she lives with her mother. Luz has a store in her mother’s house, where she and her children sell dry goods, vegetables, spices and meat. She works seven days a week, and her children help her with the store.  Luz needs a loan of 2600 soles to buy rice and sugar.  Luz’s dreams are to educate her children and to expand her business. 

Translated from Spanish by Cynthia McMurry, Kiva Fellow

Luz es socia del Banco Comunal Desarrollo. 
Luz es casada, tiene 39 años y 3 hijos, Luz tiene una tienda en la casa de su mama en donde también vive, Luz vende abarrotes, verduras, especerías, carne, actividad que realiza todos los días con la ayuda de sus hijos. 
Luz necesita un préstamo de 2600 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra de arroz y azúcar. 
Los sueños de Luz son educar a sus hijos e incrementar su negocio.

loans.use: Buy rice and sugar

loans.name: Alejandrina

texts.en:
Alejandrina P. R. is seventy-seven years old.  Her husband no longer works and they have five adult children.  Alejandrina supports her family by renting rooms in her small guesthouse in Pucallpa, Peru.  The city where Alejandrina and her family live is the bustling capital of the Ucayali district.  The area is characterized by hot, humid weather and the Ucayali River which meanders through the dense jungle, eventually meeting up with the Amazon River.

Alejandrina has been a member of her communal bank, Mujeres Emprendedoras¸ or the Women Entrepreneurs, for three years.  She started off with loans of 300 Nuevo Soles but her loan amounts have grown as she has maD. her repayments faithfully and on time.


Alejandrina is currently requesting a loan of 1,500 Nuevo Soles to fix the rooms she rents in her guesthouse.  Alejandrina will repay her loan is six months. She would like to purchase wood and construction materials to replace the walls and ceilings of the rental rooms.  Alejandrina is pictured in front of several of the rooms she rents. Her renters´ laundry hangs from lines behind her

loans.use: To purchase construction material to rebuild a rental property

loans.name: Irene

texts.en:
Irene is a member of the Desarrollo (“Development”) Village Bank.  Irene is 56 years old and married with two children. Irene runs a neighborhood store called Cuzco from her home, where she sells dry goods, vegetables, meat, perfume, and special order clothing. She also has a call center. She buys her wares in Lima, and runs the store with the help of her husband and children.  Irene needs a loan of 2000 soles to buy rice, sugar and pasta.  Irene dreams of putting a roof onto her house (which is currently covered with corrugated tin) and of owning a car. 

 Translated from Spanish by Cynthia McMurry, Kiva Fellow

Irene es socia del Banco Comunal Desarrollo. 
Irene es casada, tiene 56 años y 2 hijos, Irene tiene una bodega bazar llamado Cuzco, ubicada en su casa que esta en el distrito D. Jesús Nazareno,  en donD. venD. abarrotes, verduras, carne, perfumes, ropa a pedido, también tiene un locutorio, sus productos los adquiere en la ciudad D. Lima, la atención D. su negocio lo realiza con la ayuda D. su esposo e hijos. 
Irene necesita un préstamo D. 2000 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra D. arroz, azúcar y fideos. 
Irene sueña con techar el primer piso D. su casa y tener un carro.

loans.use: Buy rice, sugar and pasta

loans.name: Rosario

texts.es: Rosario tiene 27 años, es madre soltera, vive con sus padres y su pequeña hija. Hace 3 años se dedica a la crianza de animales, ya que tiene sus tres vaquitas, las cuales cuida y alimenta de manera adecuada para luego venderlas en los mercados. Todas las mañanas, Rosario las ordeña y sale a vender leche en los mercados o por alrededores de su domicilio, gracias a ello puede tener ingresos diarios para cubrir los gastos de alimentación diaria de su hija y los de sus padres a quienes también viene apoyando. Este es quinto préstamo con MFP, y hasta la fecha no ha tenido problemas de pago  con sus cuotas anteriores. Con el dinero que solicita comprará de una vaca para aumentar su producción y venta de leche.
texts.en:
Rosario is 27; she is a single mother and lives with her parents and her little daughter. Three years ago she decided to go into livestock; she has three calves which she is rearing and fattening in order to sell them in the market.

Every morning, Rosario milks her cows and goes out to sell the milk in the markets or door to door; this provides her with an income to maintain her daughter and her parents, who also depend on her.

This is her fifth loan from MFP; to date, she has always repaid promptly. She will use the money to buy a cow to increase milk production.

Translated from Spanish by John Rynne, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy a cow

loans.name: Cristina

texts.en:
Cristina is a member of the Desarrollo (“Development”) Village Bank.  She is 53 years old and married with four children. Cristina lives in the city of Pichari, in the Ayacuchan jungle. Cristina has a seafood restaurant called Palacio D. los Mariscos (Shellfish Palace). Her son administers the restaurant, and has two employees to help him. Cristina also has a clothing store in a rented location, where she sells baby clothing.  Cristina needs a loan of 2000 soles to buy baby clothes.  Cristina dreams of buying a plot of land, of having her own store, and of buying a car. 

Translated from Spanish by Cynthia McMurry, Kiva Fellow

Cristina es socia del Banco Comunal Desarrollo. 
Cristina es casada, tiene 53 años y 4 hijos, Cristina vive en la ciudad D. Pichari que esta en la selva ayacuchana, se ubica a 7 horas D. la ciudad D. Ayacucho, Cristina tiene una Marisquería llamado Palacio D. los Mariscos, su hijo es quien se encarga D. al administración D. este negocio, para lo cual cuenta con el apoyo D. 2 personas. Además Cristina tiene un bazar en un local alquilado,  en donD. venD. ropa D. bebes. 
Cristina necesita un préstamo D. 2000 soles dinero que será invertido en la compra D. ropa D. bebe. 
Cristina sueña con comprar un terreno, tener local propio y comprar un carro.

loans.use: Buy baby clothes

loans.name: Rosario

texts.es: Rosario tiene 44 años, vive con su hija de 20 años. Desde hace10 años se dedica a la venta de biscochos y bocaditos, los que elabora cuando recibe pedidos, los cuales son continuos, y es muy conocida por todos sus vecinos, quienes  para cada celebridad recurren a doña Rosario, quien muy gustosa atiende los pedidos y reparte sus bocadillos con mucha responsabilidad, además se está haciendo muy conocida, no tan solo por su localidad, sino también por los alrededores, y espera seguir creciendo, aumentar sus pedidos y poder  adquirir un horno para incrementar su producción. Rosario está en su segundo préstamo con MFP, y hasta la fecha viene trabajando con mucho entusiasmo, mostrándose líder y ejemplo para con las demás socias de su banco comunal. Rosario tiene pensado invertir en la compra de harina y diversos productos necesarios para seguir trabajando en sus pedidos.
texts.en:
Rosario is 44 years of age and lives with her 20 year old daughter. For the last ten years she has concentrated on the sale of biscochos (sponge cake) and bocaditos (savory snacks); those that are made to order as well as those which she produces regularly. She is very well known among her neighbors, who for every festivity they turn to Rosario, who is pleased to attend to their requests, and to deliver her tasty snacks in good order. And besides, she is becoming very well known, not just in her neighborhood but in the surrounding areas. She hopes this will continue to grow, her orders will increase, and she will be able to acquire an oven in order to increase her production. Rosario is in her second loan with MFP, and thus far has been working with much enthusiasm, showing herself as a leader and an example for the other members of her communal bank. Rosario has been thinking to invest in the purchase of flour and various products necessary in order to continue working on her orders.

Translated from Spanish by Daniel Kvaka, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Compra de los ingredientes para la preparación de bocaditos

loans.name: Ruben

texts.es: Rubén tiene 22 años, es soltero y vive con su padre. Es un joven dedicado a su negocio de venta de bebidas y comida que realiza todos los fines de semana en asociado con unas amistades con quienes inició su negocio hace un año, y en donde  puede desenvolverse como chef, actividad que le agradó desde que era un niño. A Rubén le agrada servir a las personas, atenderlos es muy gratificante, y es aún más, cuando ve que las personas degustan exquisitamente de  los platos, que con esmero, prepara  todas las mañanas, aunque no cuente con todos los utensilios  suficientes, trata de ofrecer la mejor atención a sus consumidores. Rubén está iniciando su primer préstamo con MFP, y se caracteriza por ser una persona muy puntual  y responsable. Con la cantidad solicitada mejorará la ambientación de su local e implementará con mayor cantidad de bebidas para ofrecerlas en su restaurante.
texts.en:
Rubén is 22 years old and single and lives with his father. He is a young man who is dedicated to his business of selling food and drinks which he carries out every weekend together with some friends with whom he began his business a year ago. His business has allowed him to develop as a chef, an activity that has been to his liking ever since he was a child. Rubén enjoys being of service to people. He finds looking after them very gratifying, and even more so when he sees them sampling the exquisite dishes which he prepares with great care every morning. Although he doesn't have all of the necessary utensils, he tries to provide the best attention to his consumers. Rubén is beginning his first loan with MFP, and describes himself as a person who is very punctual and responsible. The amount he is requesting will be used to improve the ambiance of his restaurant and to stock up on additional beverages to be offered there.

Translated from Spanish by Daniel Kvaka, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Mejorar la ambientación de su restaurante

loans.name: Alicia

texts.en:
Alicia D. A. M. has a general goods store in the “No. 2” Market in Pucallpa, Peru.  Alicia is fifty-seven years old and has five children with her husband who is a gas station attendant.  Alicia has been a member of the Talented Women communal bank for six years and uses the capital from her loans to support her business.

Alicia is requesting a loan of 1,000 Nuevo Soles to purchase stock for her market stall.  She will buy electrical wiring, outlets, and fixtures in addition to machetes and tools.  Alicia will repay her loan in four monthly installments.

loans.use: To purchase electrical wiring, outlets, and fixtures in addition to machetes and tools

loans.name: Alicia

texts.es:
La señora Alicia pertenece al Banco Comunal LAS BRISAS ,ubicado en  jr. Cesar Vallejo Mz::L Lt:17- del  Distrito de  Yarina-Cocha del Departamento de Ucayali en la Casa  de la  señora Cledy Sandoval. Tiene 67 años y es madre  de un hijo mayor de edad  de profesión Gasfitero,no tiene esposo es madre soltera, lo poco que ganaban lo invertia  en productos para vender raspadillas, pero ella anhelaba mas ,con el primer préstamo que recibió aumento  rápidamente su capital hasta lograr comprarse un motocar. 

Su gran ímpetu de querer seguir creciendo alquiló su motocar ,lava ropas ,se compro una lavadora, ahora tiene un reservorio de agua para que venda  hielo.

Con este préstamo de  S/. 2000 el cual será pagado  en cuatro meses. ,comprara un nuevo motocar  para incrementar mas  su venta.

La señora Alicia esta muy agradecida  y contenta con Manuela Ramos por su mejora en su vida  y los grandes frutos  que le brinda  Manuela Ramos.
texts.en:
Alicia is a member of the Las Brisas Communal Bank, which is located at 17 Jr. Cesar Vallejo Mz. in the Yarina-Cocha district, in the region of Ucayali. Las Brisas Communal Bank is based out of the house of Mrs. Cledy Sandoval. Alicia is 67 years old and single. She is a single mother with one grown son who works a a plumber. Until recently, Alicia had made her living selling popsicles, but she always dreamed of doing something more, and with her first loan she was able to leverage her working capital so quickly that she could soon afford a motorized vending cart. With her fierce drive to succeed, she rented out her cart and used the income to buy a washing machine and eventually, a freezer. Now she washes clothes and sells ice. With this next loan of 2,000 soles, which she will pay back in 4 months, Alicia will buy a new scooter which will help her to increase her sales. Alicia is very grateful for the help that Manuela Ramos has given her. Her life has improved remarkably and it makes her happy to see her hard work bear fruit.

Translated from Spanish by Sara Sultan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to buy a scooter

loans.name: Ana Isabel

texts.en:
Ana Isabel A. R. is 33 years old.  She lives in Pucallpa, Peru, a major city in the eastern jungle region of the country.  This steaming, humid city is situated on the banks of the Ucayali River, a tributary of the Amazon River.  Ana is a member of the Las Heroinas communal bank and has been taking out small business loans for 2 years to support her clothes selling business.

Ana is currently requesting a Kiva loan of 1,200 Nuevo Soles to stock up on inventory to sell. Ana plans to purchase blouses, polo t-shirts, sneakers and other clothing for children, women and men.  She would also like to use her loan to buy shoes which she will resell to her customers.  She will repay the loan in monthly installments.  She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase blouses, polo t-shirts, sneakers and other clothing

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.en:
Ana Mara Vasquez P. is a member of the Mujeres Emprendedoras or “Women Entrepreneurs” communal bank.  She has been with this group for three years and likes working with Manuela Ramos.  She lives in the city of Pucallpa, Peru.  A busy and rapidly growing city in the northern jungle region of Peru’s Amazon river basin.

Ana Maria is requesting S/1,700 to support her clothing business.  She uses her Kiva loan to purchase pants, blouses, lingerie, t-shirts, earrings, bracelets and ankle bracelets to sell in her store. 

Ana Maria’s business helps support her and her husband, who constructs boats for a living.  Ana Maria is twenty two years old and as yet does not have any children.

loans.use: to purchase pants, blouses, lingerie, t-shirts, earrings, bracelets and ankle bracelets for resale

loans.name: Asunción

texts.en:
Asuncion R. M. is a 71 year old mother of four.  Asuncion was born and raised in Tierra Blanca, a small farming community near Pucallpa, the regional capital of the tropical Amazonian department of Ucayali.  Fifty years ago, Pucallpa itself was a tiny caserio or village, but everything changed when the only paved highway leading into the Amazon region was built and Pucallpa became the gateway to the jungle at the road’s end.  Since the mid-20th century, the city has sprung up and engulfed the surrounding caserios, including Asuncion’s Tierra Blanca.

Asuncion makes a living selling food at night in front of her home which is now located in the city’s center where fifty years ago there was nothing but farms and the encroaching jungle border.  Asuncion works from 4:00 pm till 11:00 pm every night selling juanes and yucca con paiche, traditional chicken and fish dishes of the Amazon Basin region.

Asuncion is requesting 2,800 Nuevo Soles to purchase chicken, rice, green bananas, bihao leaves (which are used to wrap the chicken and rice mixtures for the juanes dish).

Asuncion emphasizes that it is important to her that she keeps earning her own living selling food.

loans.use: Comprar pollo, arroz, plátanos verdes, bihao hojas (que se utilizan para envolver el pollo y mezclas de arroz para el juanes plato).

loans.name: Belinda

texts.en:
Belinda Amasifuen Huaraqui is a thirty-nine year old mother of four. She lives in Pucallpa, a major city in the eastern jungle region of Peru. Belinda is a member of the "Damas del Oriente" or "Ladies of the Orient" communal bank, which was named for the Villa Oriente neighborhood where the bank members congregate monthly.

Belinda is requesting a loan of 1,700 Nuevo Soles to support her broomstick sales business. She will use the loan to purchase her wares in bulk. She buys packages of 100 broomsticks at a time. 

She is pictured above with the materials she works with and her finished product. Belinda thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy merchandise in bulk

loans.name: Susana Del Carmen

texts.es:
En el municipio de Chichigalpa de la ciudad de Chinandega, la señora Susana de Carmen P. se dedica a su actividad de venta de refrescos y platanitos en la terminal de buses donde todos los días desde muy tempranas horas de la mañana inicia a comercializar sus refrescos con el propósito de mantener su familia compuesta por tres hijos de los cuales uno de ellos es una pequeña niña que requiere de mucho cuido por su corta edad. Le da gracias a Dios porque le ha ayudado a salir adelante en su negocio por medio de sus esfuerzos y ha llevado el sustento a su hogar.

La razón por la cual ella acude a Ceprodel es para ser beneficiada con un crédito que le permita la compra de la materia prima para la elaboración de los refrescos. Es por esta razón que espera que su crédito sea otorgado para así continuar con el sustento de su actividad y el de sus pequeños.
texts.en:
Susana de Carmen P. lives in the Chichigalpa district of the city of Chinandega; she sells soft drinks and plantain chips at the bus terminal, where she opens her stall very early every morning.

This enables her to maintain her family of three children, including her very young daughter, who needs a lot of attention because of her age. She thanks God for helping our succeed in business through her hard work and enabling her to maintain her household.

She has applied for this loan from Ceprodel in order to buy ingredients to make soft drinks. She hopes to receive the loan so as to be able to continue with her business and maintain her children.

Translated from Spanish by John Rynne, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy ingredients to make soft drinks

loans.name: Carmen

texts.en:
Carmen H. T. is 40 years old.  She lives in Pucallpa, Peru, a major city in the eastern jungle region of the country.  This steaming, humid city is situated on the banks of the Ucayali River, a tributary of the Amazon River. 

Carmen is a member of the Las Heroinas communal bank and has been taking out small business loans for 10 years to support her hammock business.  Carmen makes hammocks for a living, a popular purchase of travelers leaving on riverboats headed to other port towns along the Ucayali.  Riverboats often do not have beds for passengers to sleep in, so everyone must bring along their own hammock.  Carmen sells both to travelers and to people who would like a hammock to relax in their own home.  She has a shop in the “No. 1” market in Pucallpa which is located one block from the city´s river port.

Carmen is currently requesting a Kiva loan of 3,000 Nuevo Soles to purchase cloth, thread and other materials used in making hammocks.  She will repay the loan in monthly installments.  She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase cloth, thread and other materials used in making hammocks

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es:
Carmen Sanchez D. N. is fifty-two years old.  She lives with her three children in the city of Pucallpa, Peru.  Carmen’s business a small internet café situated off of her neighborhood’s plaza.  Carmen is a member of the Las Brisas communal bank and has worked with her group for two years and four months.  Carmen’s life have changed drastically since she joined her bank and started attending the group meetings.  She used to never socialize with others and lived a very solitary lifestyle.  When she joined the bank she was able to meet regularly with other bank members and become friends.  Carmen now loves the companionship she receives from the other Las Brisas entrepreneurs.

Carmen uses her loans to build up her internet café.  She now has several computers which she maintains and rents at hourly rates.  Carmen is requesting a loan of 2,000 Nuevo Soles to purchase six mice, six keyboards and six headests.
texts.en:
Carmen Sanchez D. N. tiene 52 años D. edad. Ella vive con sus tres hijos en la ciudad D. Pucallpa, Peru. Su negocio es un pequeño café internet situado en la plaza D. su barrio. Ella es miembro del banco comunitario Las Brisas, y ha trabajado con su grupo por espacio D. 2 años y 4 meses. La vida D. Carmen ha cambiado drásticamente desD. que se unió al banco y comenzó a asistir a las reuniones D. grupo. En el pasado ella nunca hacía vida social y vivía una vida bastante solitaria. DesD. que se unió al banco sin embargo, ella ha podido conocer gente y reunirse regularmente con otros miembros del banco, con quienes ha forjado amistades. Carmen actualmente disfruta mucho D. la compañía D. los otros empresarios D. Las Brisas. Ella utiliza los préstamos que obtiene para seguir construyendo su café internet. Ahora ella posee varios computadores, los cuales los mantiene y arrienda por hora. Actualmente Carmen necesita un préstamo D. 2,000 Nuevos Soles para comprar 6 mice, 6 teclados y 6 audífonos.

Translated from Spanish by Monica Hayden, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase equipment for her internet stations

loans.name: Shelly

texts.es: Shelly tiene 20 años, vive con su madre. Gracias a su trabajo como vendedora de cosméticos por catálogo pudo independizarse  económicamente de su madre y poder a la vez, cubrir las necesidades que con su sola carrera profesional no puede cubrir, es así que desde hace 2 años vende estos productos de belleza a sus compañeras de trabajo que a diario solicitan sus perdidos a la vez que la simpatía de Shelly influye en las demás personas, las cuales se sienten muy complacidos por el cálido trato que  les brinda. Pero sin duda,  lo difícil es tratar de llegar a su record como vendedora y trata de que mes a mes sus pedidos crezcan considerablemente y lograr obtener  cuantiosas ganancias. Ella es nueva en MFP, y como tal, está muy comprometida en no fallar, por ello se muestra responsable. Shelly tiene que aprovechar los productos de oferta de los catálogos de belleza para poder revenderlos a mejores precios, para ello invertirá la suma que solicita.
texts.en:
Shelly is 20 years old and lives with her mother. Thanks to her work as a salesperson of catalog cosmetics, she has become financially independent of her mother, while at the same time is able to meet the expenses of her own professional career. In this way for the last two years, she has been selling beauty products to her co-workers. They are placing orders daily while at the same time Shelly's kindness reaches others who feel very pleased by the warm relationship which she provides. But without a doubt, the hard part is to try to reach her record as a salesperson, and month by month as her orders grow considerably, she manages to obtain substantial returns. Shelly is a new member of MFP and, as such, is very committed to succeeding so as to demonstrate how responsible she is. Shelly needs to improve the offerings of her lines of the beauty products in order to be able to re-sell them at better prices. That is how she intends to invest the sum she is requesting.

Translated from Spanish by Daniel Kvaka, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Incremento de productos para aumentar su stock

loans.name: Susi

texts.es: Susi tiene 34 años, vive con su esposo y sus tres hijos. Ella es enfermera técnica, pero el cuidado de sus hijos la obligó a dedicarse a su hogar, esto no limitó su capacidad de trabajar y contribuir en los gastos, es así que hace 3 años se dedica a la venta de comida dentro de su domicilio, no descuida su casa y mantiene su negocio propio. Gracias a esta actividad no deja de sentirse útil  para obtener dinero y por la gran concurrencia de personas por su zona, puede vender grandes cantidades de platos al día, lo dificultoso es la preparación de grandes cantidades de comida. Susy está en su 7mo préstamo con MFP, y hasta la fecha está muy contenta de formar  parte de este banquito comunal y se  identifica como una persona responsable. Por las festividades tendrá que duplicar las cantidades de comida que prepara y atender algunos pedidos que tendrá, para satisfacer estos requerimientos invertirá la cantidad que solicita en diversos utensilios y víveres.
texts.en:
Susi is 34 years old and lives with her husband and their three children. She is a medical assistant but the care of her children obliges her to dedicate herself to the home. This has not limited her capacity to work and contribute towards household expenses. That is why, for the last three years, she has devoted herself to the sale of meals prepared at her house. Without neglecting her home, she is able to maintain her own business. Thanks to this activity she thinks she will always be able to support herself, and due to the large congregation of people in her area, she will be able to sell large quantities of her Dish of the Day. The most difficult aspect is the preparation of large quantities of food. Susi is in her seventh loan with MFP, and so far she is very content to be a part of this little communal bank and to be known as a responsible person. For the holidays, she will have to double the amount of food she prepares, and pay attention to her orders. In order to accomplish this she will invest the amount of her loan in various cooking utensils and groceries.

Translated from Spanish by Daniel Kvaka, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Compra de utensilios y víveres para la preparación de alimentos

loans.name: Tania

texts.es: Tania tiene 32 años, es soltera, vive con sus padres y hermanos. Desde pequeña trabajó en diversas actividades ayudando a sus padres, entre estas actividades aprendió a vender cerveza al por mayor, y está dentro de este negocio hace 10 años, se siente muy a gusto con la actividad que realiza, ya que el comercio es lo que más le agradó realizar desde niña. Gracias a que este negocio es rentable por las diversas fiestas patronales y compromisos festivos en su ciudad puede vender grandes cantidades de cerveza y sus ganancias son muy buenas. Con el tiempo espera ser una gran distribuidora o por lo menos, ser la más reconocida dentro de su entorno. Tania está en su segundo préstamo con MFP, y espera seguir trabajando como hasta hoy, a base de mucha responsabilidad y cumplimiento de pagos. Con el dinero solicitado comprará mayor cantidad de cajas de cerveza y aprovechar las fiestas para mejorar sus ventas.
texts.en:
Tania is 32 years old, single and lives with her parents and brothers. Since she was a little girl she worked at different activities helping her parents. Among these activities she learned how to sell beer wholesale, and has been in this business for the last ten years. She feels very content with this business, since she has liked the trade business since she was little. Thanks to the lucrative aspect of this business, particularly thanks to the many community events that take place in her town, she can sell large quantities of beer at very good profit. In time she hopes to become a great distributor, or at least be well known in her circle. Tania is currently on her second loan with MFP, and she expects to continue to work as she has been, with great sense of responsibility and a good repayment record. With the money that she is requesting, she will buy more boxes of beer with which she hopes to increase her sales during the holidays.

Translated from Spanish by Monica Hayden, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Incremento de la cantidad de bebidas que vende

loans.name: Valarie

texts.es: Valarie tiene 19 años y vive con sus padres. Ella es una joven que desde muy niña fue aprendiendo la actividad familiar, que es la costura, ya que su padre es modista, y fue quien poco a poco influenció en ella para que aprendiera, pero no se imaginó que  su hija  aprendiera tan rápido, tanto así que desde un año Valarie se dedica a reparar diversas costuras de las prendas que les traen las personas, y aun más confecciona ternos que le solicitan, los cuales los hace muy bien. Gracias a su gran habilidad  puede ayudar a sus padres con  los gastos de la casa  y también colaborar con la cantidad de pedidos que  hay  cada mes. Este es su segundo préstamo con MFP, y espera continuar como hasta ahora, con la misma responsabilidad y puntualidad para con su grupo. Con el dinero que solicita comprará grandes cantidades de tela para confeccionar los ternos que tiene como pedido para hacerlos de la mejor calidad.
texts.en:
Valarie is 19 years old and lives with her parents. She has been learning the family business, which is sewing, since she was little. Her father is a tailor, and he has gradually educated her on the craft, although he never imagined she would be such a fast learner, shown by the fact that for a year now Valarie has been repairing garments and making suits for customers, which she does very well. Thanks to her great skill she can help her parents with the household expenses, as well as assist with the great number of orders that come in every month. This is her second loan with MFP, and she expects to continue as she has, with responsibility and timely payments. The money requested will be used to purchase large amounts of fabric to make quality suits for the customers.

Translated from Spanish by Monica Hayden, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Compra de grandes cantidades de tela

loans.name: Yosalin

texts.es: Yosalin tiene 18 años, es casada, vive con su esposo y su pequeño hijo. Desde muy pequeña ayudó a su madre en la crianza de sus animales, ahora, desde que se casó hace un año tiene sus propios animales, los cuales cuida y engorda para luego venderlos en los mercados, esta actividad le permite solventar los gastos de su casa, pero lo dificultoso es sembrar para el alimento que requieren sus animales, ya que no es fácil cortar los pastos y llevarlos a los corrales de sus animales, sin embargo esta actividad le ayuda a cooperar con su esposo en los gastos familiares, ya que son jóvenes, pero con muchas ganas de prosperar. Yosalin es nueva en MFP, y pretende seguir perteneciendo a este grupo por mucho tiempo, ella se caracteriza como una mujer entusiasta y trabajadora. Con el dinero que solicita comprará un becerrito para incrementar su ganado.
texts.en:
Yosalin is 18 years old, married, lives with her husband and a small son. Since she was little she helped her mother raising animals. Now that she is married she owns her own animals, which she takes care of and fattens to sell at the market. This activity helps her pay for her household expenses. However, the difficulty is dealing with the feed for her animals, since it isn't easy to cut the grasses and transport them to the animal pens. Nevertheless, this activity helps her assist her husband with the family expenses, since they are both young but eager to prosper. Yosalin is new to MFP, and she intends to continue to belong to this group for a very long time. She is enthusiastic and a very good worker. With the money obtained she will buy a small calf to increase her herd.

Translated from Spanish by Monica Hayden, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Compra de un becerro

loans.name: Ysabel

texts.es: Ysabel tiene 42 años, es casada, vive con su esposo y sus 4 hijos. Ella cría animales menores, como gallinas, cuyes y conejos, los que vende por pedidos, esta actividad la viene realizando por más de 3 años, tiempo en que se inició criando algunos animales para consumo propio, pero las personas empezaron a solicitarle en venta algunos conejos y cuyes, desde entonces, poco a poco fue incrementando las cantidades y los vendía esporádicamente, pero ahora, la gran mayoría de pobladores le hacen grandes pedidos, y cuando hay festividades en mayor cantidad por que se degustan diversos platos típicos a base de cuy, es así que Ysabel aprovecha todas fechas para vender a precios mayores que beneficien su economía. Este es su primer préstamo con MFP, pero es una mujer muy trabajadora que no le faltará el dinero para pagar sus cuentas. Con el dinero solicitado realizará y mejorará los corrales para sus animales.
texts.en:
Ysabel is 42 years old and married, and lives with her husband and their four children. She raises small animals such as roosters, guinea pigs and rabbits, which she has been selling for more than three years. She began by raising a few animals for her own consumption, but people began to solicit her to buy rabbits and guinea pigs, and since then she has gradually increased the quantity and sold them sporadically. But now, the vast majority of people make large orders, and in greater quantities when there are festivities because there are many guinea pig-based dishes. Ysabel takes advantage of all these dates to sell at higher prices to benefit economically. This is her first loan with MFP, but she is a very hardworking woman who will not fail to pay her debts. With this loan she will construct and improve corrals for her animals.

Translated from Spanish by Trisha Bury, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Improve animal corrals

loans.name: Mercedes Del Socorro

texts.es:
El Nombre de la Señora Mercedes del Socorro A. M., su edad es de 47 años, su estado civil es casada, Doña Mercedes tiene 2 hijos de los cuales sus edades son de 14 años y 16 años su hijo menor  de 14 años cursa el 2 año de secundaria y su hijo mayor de 16 años cursa el 3 año de secundaria, su esposo labora como docente del colegio publico Instituto Nacional de Occidente, sus propósitos son de ampliar su negocio para obtener mejores ingresos para su familia ya que la situación actual esta muy difícil sus deseos son tener prosperidad en su trabajo por lo que tiene que sacar adelante a su familia y sus sueños son superar los obstáculos que se le presenten para llevar a cabo sus propósitos que no por ser pequeñas dejan de ser importantes.

La actividad económica a la que se dedica es una pulpería en la que vende los productos como: golosinas, galletas, caramelos, refrescos y pan, la ubicación de su negocio es en su casa de habitación Fundeci 3 etapa, el tiempo que tiene de poseer su negocio es de2 años, sus inicios se dan por que necesitaba que a su familia le proporcionaran ingresos y decide colocar en su casa una pulpería y comenzó instalando los productos de sopas y granos básicos por lo que tuvo la afluencia de clientes que es ella esperaba y decide invertir mas en su negocio, el financiamiento es para  capital de trabajo destinado a la compra de pollo, granos básicos y carnes y esta muy contenta de trabajar con fundación y las organizaciones amigas que ayudan a los clientes a salir adelante.
texts.en:
Mrs. Mercedes del Socorro A. M. is 47 years old and married. Mercedes has two sons, aged 14 and 16. Her younger son is in his second year of high school, and her older son is in his third year of high school. Her husband works as a teacher at the Instituto Nacional del Occidente public school. Her intent is to expand her business to obtain a better income for her family, since their current situation is very difficult. Her wish is to have prosperity in her work to get her family ahead, and her dream is to overcome the obstacles she is presented with to see through her goals--just because they are small does not mean they are not important. Her economic activity is a grocery shop in which she sells products like candies, cookies, caramels, soft drinks and bread. Her business is located in her home. She has owned the business for two years, starting it because she needed to provide an income for her family. She decided to place a shop in her house and began stocking soup and grain products. She had an influx of customers, as she'd hoped, and decided to invest more in her business. This loan is for the purchase of chicken, grains and meats. She is very happy to work with the foundation and friendly organizations that help their clients get ahead.

Translated from Spanish by Trisha Bury, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Working capital

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Zoila

texts.es: Zoila tiene 34 años, es soltera, vive con sus padres y hermanos. Desde muy joven buscó la forma de ayudar a sus padres en los gastos de su hogar y hace 6 años encontró en la ferretería la oportunidad de hacerlo, a pesar de que en un inicio las cosas no resultaron muy bien tuvo que esforzarse mucho para hacer de su negocio una alternativa de desarrollo. Ahora, gracias al buen trato que les da a sus clientes y a la excelente atención que hay en su local, que a pesar de ser alquilado, ha tenido buenos ingresos para solventar sus gastos, sin embargo en estos tiempos desea tener un local propio, y esto significa para ella, esforzarse aún más para realizarlo. Zoila es nueva en MFP, y sus deseos de superación la motivaron a formar parte de este grupo, donde es reconocida como una mujer muy responsable. Con el dinero que solicita comprará grandes cantidades de materiales de construcción, ya que es lo que más solicitan en su negocio.
texts.en:
Zoila is 34 years old, single, and lives with her parents and siblings. Since she was very young, she sought a way to help her parents with their household expenses, and six years ago found the opportunity to do so in a hardware store. Although things did not start out so well, she endeavored to make an alternative development from her business. Now, thanks to the good treatment she gives her customers and the excellent solicitude in her location, she has had sufficient earnings to cover her expenses. At this time, however, her location is rented, and she wishes to own it. For her, this means working even harder to achieve it. Zoila is new to MFP, and her desire to succeed motivated her to become part of this group, where she is known as a very responsible woman. With this money, she will purchase greater quantities of construction materials, as they are the most sought after in her business.

Translated from Spanish by Trisha Bury, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase construction materials for her hardware store

loans.name: Alex

texts.es: Alex tiene 25 años, es casado y vive con su joven familia. Se dedica a la crianza de animales, los cuales vende después de haberlos engordado y criado por una temporada, esta actividad lo acompaña por 5 años, siendo éstos, los años donde tiene la satisfacción de trabajar en una labor no tan pesada, sino de cuidado para con los animales, en cuanto a sus vacunas y alimentación, necesarias para su crecimiento. En el caso de sus vaquitas puede obtener una ganancia adicional, ya que vende la leche que producen en los mercados o a sus vecinos. Alex quiere ir creciendo poco a poco, sin apresurarse en tomar decisiones precipitadas, quiere seguir vendiendo sus propios animales y leche, evitando a los intermediarios mayoristas. Este es su 5 préstamo con MFP, y gracias a los préstamos obtenidos ha tenido la oportunidad de crecer considerablemente, es por ello que está muy agradecido y su compromiso con sus pagos lo mantiene firmemente. Con el dinero solicitado adquirirá una vaca de mejor raza, la cual tiene un valor de 1500 soles, saldo que él aumentará a la cantidad solicitada.
texts.en:
Alex is 25 years old, married and lives with his young family. He works raising animals, which he sells once he has fattened and raised them for a while, and has done so for five years. In these years, he has had the satisfaction of working in a job that is not too heavy, caring for the animals by providing the vaccines and nutrition necessary for their growth. His small cows can bring additional income, as he sells the milk they produce in markets or to his neighbors. Alex wants to keep growing little by little, without rushing into hasty decisions. He wants to keep selling his own animals and milk, avoiding middlemen. This is his fifth loan with MFP, and thanks to the loans he's obtained, he's had the opportunity to grow considerably. For this, he is very grateful and maintains firmly his commitment to repayment. With this loan he will acquire a better breed of cow, valued at 1500 soles, which is why he requests a greater amount.

Translated from Spanish by Trisha Bury, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase a better breed of cow

loans.name: Men

texts.en: Men S. is 42 years old and lives in the Kompong Tom Province. She earns a living raising pigs in a stall behind her house which she sells for slaughter in six months time after she begins raising them. She can raise at least two pigs per year. Men S. has been running this business since 1993 and is currently earning $4 a day. She is married with two children; all of them are single and go to school. Her husband, Mr. Mang Tit, 43, is a construction worker. Men S. requested a loan of $600 as capital. This would help her to save and buy a rice mill to provide her services for rice farming and to raise the piglets.

loans.use: To buy a rice mill and piglets

loans.name: Sorn

texts.en: Sorn O. is a resident of Kompong Tom Province and earns a living by raising pigs in a pen next to her house. She currently earns around $4 per day and covers her family's expenses. She is 27 years old and married without children. Her husband is a local rice farmer, as well as domestic ox trader. He purchases cows from far away to raise and turns a profit. Raising pigs is O.'s main source of income for meeting her family's needs. She is asking for a loan to purchase additional piglets to raise.

loans.use: to purchase additional piglets to raise

loans.name: Chea

texts.en: Chea K. makes a living raising pigs from her home and grows rice during the dry season. She is 28 years old, married without children. She lives n Kompong Tom Province with her husband, four siblings and her old father. Her husband and father are cultivators and also assist her with her farming business. Rice farming is the main source of income for her and her family. Chea is requesting a loan to purchase a pump to pump water into the rice fields and buy fertilizer for the rice crop.

loans.use: to purchase a pump to pump water and fertilizers for rice crop

loans.name: Nguyen Thi

texts.vi: Chị Nguyễn Thị Hạnh năm nay 52 tuổi, gia đình chị có 4 nguời con trong đó có 3 con đã trưởng thành. Chị tham gia Quỹ tình thương từ năm 2000. Trong suốt thời gian tham gia Quỹ tình thương chị Hạnh luôn chấp hành tốt các quy định của Quỹ sử dụng vốn hiệu quả và hoàn trả vốn đúng hạn. Hiện tại công việưc đem lại thu nhập chính cho gia đình chị Hạnhh là từ chăn nuôi gà với thu nhập 5.000.000đ/ tháng. Vòng vốn tới chị Hạnh  mong muốn được vay  10.000.000 để đầu tư vốn mua thêm gà về nuôi.
texts.en:
Mrs. Nguyen Thi H. is 52 years old. She has four children, three of them are grown up. She has participated in TYM Fund since 2000. During the time participating in the Fund, Mrs. H. always complies with the Fund's policy, she uses the loan effectively and pays back on time. Currently, the main source of income of Mrs. H.'s family is from raising chickens, with a monthly income of VND5,000,000. In this loan cycle, Mrs. H. would like to borrow VND10,000,000 to buy more chickens to raise them up.

Translated from Vietnamese by Tu Duong, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Raising chickens

loans.name: Nguyen Thi

texts.vi:
Chị Nguyễn Thị Bách 41 tuổi, chị tham gia Quỹ tình thương từ năm 1999. Sau khi tham gia Quỹ gia đình chị Bách đã mạnh dạn vay thêm vốn để mở cửa hàng chuyên kinh doanh thịt chó. Với những  món ăn ngon, giá cả hợp lý nên cửa hàng của gia đình chị luôn thu hút được lượng khách hàng rất đông. Công việc kinh doanh phát triển tốt đem lại cho gia đình chị thu nhập 5.000.000đ/ tháng
Vòng vốn tới chị mong muốn được vay 10.000.000đ để đầu tư cho công việc kinh doanh của gia đình.
texts.en:
Mrs. Nguyen Thi B. is 41 years old, she has participated in TYM Fund since 1999. After joining the Fund, Mrs. B.'s family borrowed money to open a restaurant selling dog meat. With delicious dishes and reasonable price, the restaurant attracts a large number of customers. The business is going well and and it brings a monthly income of VND5,000,000 to her family.

In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow VND10,000,000 to invest to expand the restaurant's business.

Translated from Vietnamese by Tu Duong, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Expand restaurant business

loans.name: Nguyen Thi

texts.vi:
Chị Nguyễn Thị L. năm nay 50 tuổi, chị đang sống tại xã Tam Đồng huyện Mê Linh- Hà Nội . Năm 1995  chị L. tham gia Quỹ tình thương và vay vốn để đầu tư vào chăn nuôi. Nhờ chăm chỉ làm ăn  nên công việc chăn nuôi ngày càng phát triển giúp cho kinh tế gia đình chị ngày càng ổn định hơn. Hiện tại chị L. đang đầu tư vốn để chăn nuôi gà. Bên cạnh đó hàng tháng gia đình chị còn có thêm sự hỗ trợ của các con nên hàng tháng thu nhập của gia đình chị luôn đạt 5.000.000đ/ tháng
Vòng vốn tới chị L. xin vay 13.000.000đ để đầu tư mua thêm gà và  thức ăn phục vụ cho chăn nuôi.
texts.en:
Mrs. Nguyen Thi L. is 50 years old, she lives in Tam Dong commune, Me Linh district, Hanoi. In 1995, Mrs. L. participated in the TYM Fund and borrowed money to raise poultry. Thanks to hard-work, the business of raising poultry has been growing well and helping to improve her family's economic situation. Currently, Mrs. Loan invests money in raising chickens. In addition, her family receives financial support from her children, so the monthly income of her family always reaches VND5,000,000.

In this loan cycle, Mrs. Loan requests a loan of VND13,000,000 to buy more chicken and food for poultry.

Translated from Vietnamese by Tu Duong, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Raising poultry

loans.name: Nguyen Thi

texts.vi:
Chị Nguyễn Thị Tiến năm nay 46 tuổi, chị đang sống cùng chồng và hai con đã  trưởng thành tại xã Nam Viêm thị xã Phúc Yên – Vĩnh Phúc. Năm 1999  chị Tiến tham gia Quỹ tình thương và vay vốn để đầu tư vào chăn nuôi. Hiện tại chị Lan đang đầu tư vốn để chăn nuôi lợn, bò.Đây cũng là công việc đem lại nguồn thu nhập chính cho gia đình chị hiện nay với thu nhập 5.000.000đ/ tháng,  Bên cạnh đó hàng tháng gia đình chị còn có thêm sự hỗ trợ của các con nên kinh tế gia đình ngày càng ổn định hơn.
Vòng vốn tới chị Lan xin vay 10.000.000đ để đầu tư mua thêm bò và  thức ăn phục vụ cho chăn nuôi.
texts.en:
Mrs. Nguyen Thi T. is 46 years old, she lives with her husband and two grown-up children in Nam Viem commune, Phuc Yen district, Vinh Phuc province. In 1999, Mrs. T. participated in TYM Fund and borrowed money to raise livestock. Currently, Mrs. Lan raises pigs and cows. This is the business that brings the main source of income for her family, with a monthly income of VND5,000,000. Apart from this, her family also has financial support from her children therefore the economic situation of the family is increasingly stable.

In this loan cycle, Mrs Loan would like to borrow VND10,000,000 to buy more cows and food for livestock.

Translated from Vietnamese by Tu Duong, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy cows

loans.name: Nguyen Thi

texts.vi: Chị Nguyễn Thị Sáng năm nay 50 tuổi, chị tham gia vào Quỹ tình thương từ năm 1999. Hiện tại  công việc đem lại nguồn thu nhập chính cho gia đình chị Sáng là chăn nuôi bò và trồng trọt với thu nhập  5.000.000đ/ tháng.  Vòng vốn tới chị Sáng mong muốn được vay thêm 15.000.000 đ một phần chị sử dụng để mua thêm bò về nuôi, phần còn lại chị sử dụng để đầu tư sửa S. chuồng trại phục vụ cho chăn nuôi.
texts.en:
Mrs. Nguyen Thi S. is 50 years old, she participated in TYM Fund since 1999. Currently, the businesses that bring the main sources of income for Mrs. S.'s family are raising cows and farming, with a monthly income of VND5,000,000.

In this loan cycle, Mrs. S. wishes to borrow VND15,000,000. She will use one part of the loan to buy more cows to raise, and the remaining part to renovate the barn.

Translated from Vietnamese by Tu Duong, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy cows and renovate the barn

loans.name: Nguyen Thi

texts.vi: Chị Nguyễn Thị Liên năm nay 33 tuổi, chị tham gia vào Quỹ tình thương từ năm 2000. Hiện tại  công việc đem lại nguồn thu nhập chính cho gia đình chị Liên là chăn nuôi lợn và trồng trọt với thu nhập  5.000.000đ/ tháng. Bên cạnh đó hàng tháng gia đình chị  còn có thêm  nguồn thu từ lương làm thuê của chồng nên kinh tế gia đình chị đang ngày càng ổn định. Vòng vốn tới chị Liên mong muốn được vay thêm 20.000.000 đ một phần chị sử dụng để mua thêm lợn về nuôi, phần còn lại chị sử dụng để đầu tư sửa sang chuồng trại phục vụ cho chăn nuôi.
texts.en:
Mrs. Nguyen Thi L. is 33 years old. She has participated in TYM Fund since 2000. Currently, the businesses that bring the main sources of income for Mrs. L.'s family are raising pigs and farming, with a monthly income of VND5,000,000. In addition, her family also has income from the wage for temporary work from her husband, so the economic situation of her family is getting increasingly stable.

In this loan cycle, Mrs. L. would like to borrow VND20,000,000. She will use one part of the loan to buy more pigs to raise, and she will use the remaining part of the loan to renovate the pig barns.

Translated from Vietnamese by Tu Duong, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy more pigs and renovate barns

loans.name: Vu

texts.vi: Chị Nguyễn Thị Vụ năm nay 42 tuổi, chị tham gia Quỹ tình thương từ năm 1996. Gia đình chị có 3 con trong đó có 1 con đã trưởng thành. Hiện tại chồng và con trai lớn của chị đang đi lao động tại nước ngoài còn chị Vụ ở nhà chăn nuôivà buôn bán hàng tạp hoá. Với thu nhập 5.000.000đ từ chăn nuôi, buôn bán và sự hỗ trợ của chồng, con kinh tế gia đình chị  Vụ đang ngày càng ổn định và phát triển. Vòng vốn tới chị Vụ mong muốn được vay thêm 20.000.000 đ để đầu tư mua thêm một số mặt hàng phục vụ nhu cầu tiêu dùng của bà con.
texts.en:
Ms. N. Thi Vu is 42 years old, and joined TYM fund since 1996. Her family consists of 3 children, 1 of which is now grown. Currently her husband and her eldest son are doing labor work in another country. Ms. Vu stays home to raise animals and run a grocery store. With income of 287 USD from raising animals, her grocery store and assistance from her husband and son, her family economic situation is expanding and getting more stable. For her next loan, she wishes to borrow 1150 USD to purchase additional merchandise to meet the customers' demands.

Translated from Vietnamese by Thu Ostrander, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Business

loans.name: Giap

texts.vi: Chị Nguyễn Thị Giáp năm nay 52 tuổi, chị tham gia Quỹ tình thương từ năm 1999. Gia đình chị có 3 con đều  đã trưởng thành. Hiện tại hai vợ chồng chị Giáp đang chăn nuôi và buôn bán hoa quả  còn các con đều đi làm công nhân Với thu nhập 6.000.000đ gia đình chị Giáp đang ngày càng có thêm điều kiện để cải thiện cuộc sống. Vòng vốn tới chị Giáp mong muốn được vay thêm 10.000.000 đ để đầu tư cho công việc kinh doanh mặt hàng hoa quả của gia đình.
texts.en:
Ms. N. Thi Giap is 52 years old, and joined TYM fund since 1999. She has 3 children, all are grown. Currently she and her husband raise animals and sell fruits & vegetables, and her children work for other people. With income of 345 USD her family has to meet many conditions to improve their living standard. For her next loan, she wishes to borrow 575 USD to invest in her fruits & vegetables business. .

Translated from Vietnamese by Thu Ostrander, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Business

loans.name: Tuyet

texts.vi: Chị Nguyễn Thị Tuyết năm nay 52 tuổi, chị tham gia Quỹ tình thương từ năm 1999. Gia đình chị có 2 trong đó có một con đã trưởng thành. Hiện tại gia đình chị Tuyết đang chăn nuôi, trồng trọt theo mô hình trang trại.  Với việc chăn nuôi lợn, gà, cá và trồng cây ăn quả hàng năm thu nhập của gia đình chị đạt 80.000.000đ .Vòng vốn tới chị Tuyết mong muốn được vay thêm 15.000.000 đ để đầu tư mua cá giống và thức ăn phục vụ chăn nuôi.
texts.en:
Ms. N. Thi Tuyet is 52 yrs old, and joined TYM fund since 1999. Her family has 2 children and 1 is grown. Currently Ms. Tuyet's family raises animals, and grow fruit trees. With her business of raising pigs, chickens, fish and growing fruit trees, her family's annual income is 4,667 USD. For her next loan, she wishes to borrow 875 USD to buy additional fish to raise, and feed for the animals.

Translated from Vietnamese by Thu Ostrander, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Raising animals, tree farming

loans.name: Nhi

texts.vi: Chị Nguyễn Thị Nhi năm nay 49 tuổi, chị tham gia Quỹ tình thương từ năm 1998. Gia đình chị có 3 đều đã trưởng thành. Hiện tại hai vợ chồng chị Nhi đang kinh doanh đồ uống giải khát trong khu du lịch Đại Lải với thu nhập 5.000.000đ/ tháng, các con đều có công việc làm ổn định.  .Vòng vốn tới chị Nhi mong muốn được vay thêm 15.000.000 đ để đầu tư cho công việc kinh doanh của gia đình
texts.en:
Ms. N. Thi Nhi is 49 years old, and joined TYM fund since 1998. Her family has 3 children, all are grown. Currently she and her husband have a refreshment shop in the tourist area of Dai Lai with income of 290 USD per month. All her children have stable employment. For her next loan, she wishes to borrow 875 USD to invest in her business.

Translated from Vietnamese by Thu Ostrander, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Business

loans.name: Vinh

texts.vi: Chị Lê Thị Vĩnh năm nay 46 tuổi, chị tham gia vào Quỹ tình thương từ năm 1999. Hiện tại  công việc đem lại nguồn thu nhập chính cho gia đình chị Vĩnh là chăn nuôi bò và trồng trọt với thu nhập  4.000.000đ/ tháng. Bên cạnh đó hàng tháng gia đình chị  còn có thêm  nguồn thu từ lương làm xây dựng của chồng và sự hỗ trợ của con nên kinh tế gia đình chị đang ngày càng ổn định và phát triển. Vòng vốn tới chị Vĩnh mong muốn được vay thêm 10.000.000 đ để đầu tư mua thêm bò về nuôi.
texts.en:
Ms. L. Thi Vinh is 46 years old, and joined TYM fund since 1999. Currently the main source of her family's income is her business of raising cows and farming with income of 230 USD per month. Her family also has supplemental income from her husband's work in construction and assistance from her child, and therefore, her family's economic situation is improving and becoming more stabL.. For her next loan, she wishes to borrow 575 USD to purchase additional cows to raise

Translated from Vietnamese by Thu Ostrander, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Raising animals

loans.name: Thai

texts.vi: Chị Nguyễn Thị Thái  năm nay 58 tuổi, chị tham gia vào Quỹ tình thương từ năm 2003. Chị đang sống cùng một người con đã trưởng thành tại thị xã Phúc Yên tỉnh Vĩnh phúc Hiện tại  công việc đem lại nguồn thu nhập chính cho gia đình chị Thái là từ chăn nuôi lợn gà và trồng trọt với thu nhập  4.000.000đ/ tháng. Bên cạnh đó hàng tháng gia đình chị  còn có thêm  nguồn thu từ việc đi trông trang trại thuê cho người dân địa phương nên cuộc sống của chị và các con rất ổn định. Vòng vốn tới chị Thái mong muốn được vay thêm 15.000.000 đ để đầu tư mua thêm lợn, gà về nuôi.
texts.en:
Ms. N. Thi Thai is 58 years old, and she joined TYM fund since 2003. She lives with 1 grown child in the town of Phuc Yen province of Vinh Phuc. Currently the main source of income for her family is from raising pigs and growing vegetables with income of 230 USD per month. She also makes additional money by working for other farms in the area so the economic situation for her and her children is very stable. For her next loan, she wishes to borrow 875 USD to purchase additional pigs and chickens to raise.

Translated from Vietnamese by Thu Ostrander, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Raising animals

loans.name: Nguyen Thi

texts.vi: Chị Nguyễn Thị Quế  năm nay 51 tuổi, chị tham gia vào Quỹ tình thương từ năm 1996. Gia đình chị có 4 con đều đã trưởng thành. Hiện tại  công việc đem lại nguồn thu nhập chính cho gia đình chị Thái là từ buôn bán rau và thực phẩm với thu nhập  5.000.000đ/ tháng.  Vòng vốn tới chị Quế mong muốn được vay thêm 20.000.000 đ để đầu tư cho công việc kinh doanh của gia đình
texts.en:
Mrs. Nguyen Thi Q. is 51 years old. She has joined TYM Fund (Kiva Partner in Vietnam) since 1996. She has 4 grown-up children. Currently her main source of monthly income of 5,000,000 VND (equivalent to $288/month) comes from selling vegetable and food. This time Mrs. Q. would like to borrow 20,000,000 VND (equivalent to $1150) to invest more in her business.

Translated from Vietnamese by Phuong Nguyen, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Business

loans.name: Le Thi

texts.vi: Chị Lê Thị T.  năm nay 50 tuổi, chị tham gia vào Quỹ tình thương từ năm 2003. Hiện tại  công việc đem lại nguồn thu nhập chính cho gia đình chị T. là từ kinh doanh quần áo, lương thợ xây của chồng với thu nhập 5.000.000đ/ tháng.  Vòng vốn tới chị T. mong muốn được vay thêm 10.000.000 đ để đầu tư mở rộng  kinh doanh quần áo.
texts.en:
Mrs Le Thi T. is 50 years old. She has joined TYM Fund (Kiva Partner in Vietnam) since 2003. Currently her family's main source of monthly income comes from her clothing store and her husband, a construction worker, with the total of of 5,000,000 VND (equivalent to $288/month) . This time Mrs. T. would like to borrow 10,000,000 VND (equivalent to $575) to expand her business.

Translated from Vietnamese by Phuong Nguyen, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Business

loans.name: Nguyen Thi

texts.vi: Chị Nguyễn Thị Thịnh  năm nay 53 tuổi, chị tham gia vào Quỹ tình thương từ năm 2003. Hiện tại  công việc đem lại nguồn thu nhập chính cho gia đình chị Thịnh là từ sản xuất  kinh doanh bánh chưng, giò chả và lương hưu của chồng với thu nhập 5.000.000đ/ tháng.  Vòng vốn tới chị Thịnh mong muốn được vay thêm 10.000.000 đ để đầu tư mua thêm nguyên liệu phục vụ cho công việc sản kinh doanh của gia đình.
texts.en:
Mrs. Nguyễn Thị Thịnh, 53 years old, has participated in the TYM Fund since 2003. Currently, the main sources of income for her family are from making chưng cakes (square cakes of sticky rice and bean paste) and giò chả (Vietnamese pork pies), and from her husband’s pension. Their total monthly income is about 5,000,000 VND (288 USD). In the next lending cycle, Mrs. Thịnh hopes to borrow 10,000,000 VND (575 USD) to buy ingredients for her business.

Translated from Vietnamese by Robert Sides, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Ingredients for food production business

loans.name: Eang

texts.en: Eang C. raises oxen to sell for profit and uses oxen in his cultivating business. He grows different kinds of vegetables, including cabbages and cucumbers, and sells them to a seller at the market 3 months after planting. He is 30 years old and living in a rural area of Siem Reap Province.  He is married to Srey Kheav, 29, who helps him with his crop growing. The couple have three teenagers who attend school.  Eang C. is running his business very well. Unfortunately, insects ravage his vegetable crop and C. is requesting a loan of $600 to buy insecticide to protect his crops and fertilizer to help his crops grow.

loans.use: to buy insecticide and fertilizer

loans.name: Math

texts.en: Math A. S., 38 years old, is a vegetable seller from Phnom Penh City. She runs her business in the area of the Toulsong Kei Market and sells different kinds of vegetables like cabbages, potatoes, and morning glories. She currently earns an average of $8 a dA. and has been running the business for more than five years. Math A. S. is married to Mr. Teur As Math who is a motorcycle taxi driver and also works with her in selling vegetables. She now cares for four children, all of whom are single; one of her sons is also employed as a vegetable seller. Since the pasted-fish season is coming, Math A. S. hopes to earn additional income; thus she is applying for this loan ($1,000) to purchase fish for orders and make pasted-fish to sell.

loans.use: To purchase fish and produce fish products to sell

loans.name: 22- Tân Hà Group

texts.en:
Loan Group 22 consists of six poor women, all of whom live in the Tan Ha Commune, Thanh Hoa City. Thanh Hoa City is the provincial capital of the Thanh Hoa Province, one of the poorest provinces in Vietnam. It is located approximately 150 kilometers south of Hanoi, the capital of Vietnam.

Mrs. Phung is the lead borrower of the group. She is 50 years old, married, and has two children: a 25-year-old daughter, who is a seamstress, and a 19-year-old son who is studying building construction at a technical college.  Her husband helps run the family business, a bicycle repair shop. When her children have the time, they also help repair bicycles.  

As with her previous two loans, both have been repaid on time and in full, Mrs. Phung will use her share of the loan to invest in her bicycle repair shop. More specifically, with her loan she will be able to buy 30 tires, 30 inner tubes, 20 baskets, 10 chain rings, and 40 brake cables.

Mrs. Phung will use the profits from her loan to pay her son's school fees, to buy chickens, and to provide for her family.

The $1,075 loan will be split equally between all six borrowers. The other borrowers in the group will use their share of the loan as follows: 

* Mrs. An is borrowing 3,079,800 Vietnamese Dong (approx. $181) to buy sandpaper and lacquer for her furniture refinishing business. She will also use some of the proceeds to pay her ten employees.

* Mrs. Thu will use her share of the loan to buy pig meat, rice, and vegetables to make Bánh Khoái (which is made of rice and vegetables) and Bún Chả (which consists of bacon and rice).

* Mrs. Lan operates a street stall from which she sells cooked food.  She will use her share of the proceeds to purchase rice, pork, fish, vegetables and tofu for use in her business. 

* Both Mrs. Phuong and Mrs. Dần are borrowing to buy vegetables to resell in the Cau Sang Market.

loans.use: Vegetables, rice, pork, chickens

loans.name: Chign

texts.en:
Chign C. is 23 years old and has one young lovely child. The family lives in Siem Reap Province. She currently grows vegetables for sale, and her husband is a photographer for wedding parties and other ceremonies. She has taken a loan four times with KHL and now, this is the second time with Kiva's loans.

She repaid her first loan from Kiva on time, which was used for her husband's business. With doing business well, her husband can earn the money to support the family's expenses adequately. With her first loan paid off, and to improve her husband's business a little more, Chign C. would like to apply for a second loan of $200 for her husband to purchase a new camera to replace his existing old one.

loans.use: To purchase a new camera

loans.name: Abdul Wahad

texts.en:
Abdul Wahad is 32 years old and he lives in Kabul Afghanistan. He is married with two children and has a small restaurant in Kabul. He is requesting a small loan for his business because he wants to increase the size of his shop. This will improve his income and provide a better living for his family.

He is requesting an individual loan of 50000 Afghan over a 12 month term. He wants to expand his business, buying new tables and chairs for his restaurant. This will attract more customers to the restaurant and increase his business.
